name: Brownie
description: The Brownie is a small fey creature characterized by its exceptional agility and connection to nature, embodying a playful yet cunning demeanor.
memorable: Its ability to turn invisible and resist magic makes the Brownie a tricky opponent.
goals: To support allies with magic and gather information from beasts.
relations: Often encountered with woodland creatures and other fey beings.
environment: Typically found in forests or natural settings.
strengths: High Dexterity gives it excellent evasion capabilities and magic resistance provides great defense against spell effects.
weaknesses: Very low physical strength, making it ineffective in direct melee combat.
attacks: Uses a Branch Spear for piercing damage, effective in both melee and ranged combat.
most_powerful_ability: Invisibility allows it to ambush or evade threats dramatically.
skills: Possesses good perception skills, allowing it to notice hidden occurrences.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can communicate with beasts, providing tactical advantages.
Uses Domestic Magic for minor magical tasks like cleaning or repairing.
Has a high Dexterity score, making it very agile.
Relies on stealth and magic to outmaneuver opponents.
spellcasting: Can cast Mending and Prestidigitation at will.

fey creature that communicates with beasts
brownie uses magic resistance and Domestic Magic
